summary: AN ORDINANCE increasing the expenditure authority of the Department of Neighborhoods and the Department of Administrative Services to contract for professional services to design, construct and install facades surrounding the public portable toilet units located in Seattle; and to make needed improvements to the permanent toilets located at the Pioneer Square Fire Station site; and making a reappropriation and transfer from the 1994 Budget of the Department of Finance General for such purposes.
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
